doc.title: Citizen Ca$h
doc.plot: Jane is driving her baby in an empty North American city. She leaves he baby alone in her car, as she gets out to get some cash at the ATM. When she comes back her car and baby are gone. She freaks out and falls on the ground, in shock. A young man, Johnny, runs to her. As he passes by, she grabs him by the leg, begging for help. Johnny is really stressed and pretends to be in a hurry. Jane is desperate. She grabs him with all her heart and he falls on the top of her. Johnny tries to control Jane but in vain. She's hysterical. David, forty something runs to them. For him, the girl is being rapped. He grabs Johnny and pushes him against the wall. Johnny pretends to be a victim. David wishes him to go to jail. They start a fight. Jane calls for help. Two police officers run to them.
